Located in a beautiful mountainous area between
, Călimăneşti is a small resort known for its mineral springs.
Călimăneşti is along a major bus route: hourly buses reach it from Râmnicu Vâlcea (a 20-30 minutes trip), 8-9 buses from Sibiu (1 1/2 hours away), 7-8 buses from
(5 hours away) and at least six direct buses from

There are trains from Rămnicu Vălcea approximately every two hours (travel times between 15 and 45 minutes), 4-5 times per day from Sibiu (2 - 2 1/2 hours travel time), two trains from Bucharest (4 1/2 - 5 hours) and one from
Călimăneşti itself is walkable, but to get to the northern suburb Căciulata it's advisable to take one of the above mentioned buses or the train (get off at Păuşa station).

Accommodations are available in numerous guesthouses (prices starting around €10) and several hotels (from €25).
